statement.p: A subscription plan for a GPS tracking device costs 14.99 per month plus 0.10 per location ping (sent once every 10 minutes). What is the monthly charge if the device was used for 6 hours and 1 minutes?

solution.p: First, we need to know how many pings are sent in 6 hours and 1 minutes. This is a total of \displaystyle{6}\cdot{60}+{1}={361} minutes. This is \displaystyle\frac{{361}}{{10}}={36.1} 10 minute periods. Any time past the last 10 minute segment does not generate another ping so only 36 pings will be sent.
